name: Wer Ist Der Mörder?
description:
This game is made for GER 202 course, ,Pre-Intermediate German II, from Boğaziçi Üniversity by Ali Eren Kayhan. The purpose is to create an instructional game that helps students to learn  "Relativsätze im Nominativ".  

The game is made according to a 1920x1080 screen monitor.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

The story:

You are a detective, called Sherlock, and you should try to find a murderer.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Install instructions:

If you have a computer, which operating system is Windows, you can download and play. Besides this, the game has no requirements for download and plays for now but you can support me to improve my work.
